meta.title: Partnership & Innovation Gateway
meta.description: Explore partnership opportunities and innovation initiatives with NARA Sri Lanka.
meta.keywords: partnerships, innovation, marine technology, NARA collaboration

hero.description: Connecting NARA with the global ocean science community through strategic partnerships, cutting-edge innovations, and collaborative research initiatives.

upload.title: Upload Hero Visual
upload.description: Drag and drop your high-resolution image here, or click to browse files.

globalNetwork.title: Global Research Network
globalNetwork.description: NARA collaborates with leading international institutions to advance ocean science and share knowledge for global marine conservation and sustainable development.

map.title: Global Partnership Network
map.description: Our collaborations span across continents, creating a truly global network of ocean science excellence.
map.interactiveHint: Click on markers to explore partnerships by region

innovationShowcase.title: Innovation Showcase
innovationShowcase.description: Discover cutting-edge technologies and research innovations being developed at NARA to advance ocean science and marine conservation.

impactStats.title: Innovation Impact
impactStats.description: Our innovations are driving real change in ocean science and marine conservation.

partnershipOpportunities.title: Partnership Opportunities
partnershipOpportunities.description: Join NARA's global network of partners and contribute to advancing ocean science, conservation, and sustainable development through collaborative initiatives.

form.title: Express Your Interest
form.description: Submit your partnership inquiry and our team will connect you with the most relevant opportunities.
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your organization and partnership interests...

globalNetwork.title: Global Network
globalNetwork.description: Connect with leading researchers and institutions worldwide through our extensive partnership network.

innovationAccess.title: Innovation Access
innovationAccess.description: Gain access to cutting-edge technologies, research facilities, and collaborative platforms.

impactAmplification.title: Impact Amplification
impactAmplification.description: Amplify your research impact through collaborative projects and shared resources.

technologyTransfer.title: Technology Transfer Hub
technologyTransfer.description: Discover how NARA's innovative marine technologies are transforming industries and creating sustainable solutions for ocean challenges worldwide.

process.title: Technology Transfer Process
process.description: Our structured approach ensures successful technology transfer from research to commercial application.

benefits.title: Why Choose NARA for Technology Transfer?

proven.title: Proven Track Record
proven.description: Over 50 successful technology transfers with measurable commercial impact and industry adoption.

ipProtection.title: IP Protection
ipProtection.description: Comprehensive intellectual property protection with international patents and trade secret management.

support.title: Ongoing Support
support.description: Continuous technical support, training, and partnership development throughout the commercialization journey.

cta.title: Ready to Explore Technology Transfer Opportunities?
cta.description: Connect with our technology transfer team to discuss licensing opportunities, partnership models, and commercialization strategies.

eventsCalendar.title: Events & Conferences
eventsCalendar.description: Join NARA researchers at international conferences, workshops, and partnership events. Discover opportunities for collaboration and knowledge exchange.

upcoming.title: Upcoming Registration Deadlines
upcoming.description: Don't miss these important registration deadlines for upcoming events.

impactSection.title: Partnership Impact Metrics
impactSection.description: Measuring the real-world impact of our partnerships and innovations on ocean science, economic development, and global marine conservation efforts.

ctaSection.title: Ready to Partner with NARA?
ctaSection.description: Join our global network of partners and contribute to advancing ocean science, marine conservation, and sustainable development. Together, we can create lasting impact for our oceans and communities.

footer.description: Facilitating global partnerships and driving innovation in ocean science for sustainable marine development and conservation.
